title: Models, Markets, and Monetary Policy
content: Figure 8.  Uncertainty Bands around Recent Point Estimates of r* (Selected Models)  Note:  The circle gives the r* estimate for the first quarter of 2019 from each model, while the bars indicate the 95 percent confidence  interval for the estimate.  Source:  Federal Reserve Board staff calculations, using the models indicated on the x-axis.
